name: Mochent
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: You've fallen into my trap. I'll bury you.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
introduction: The people of the Kingdom For Mochent welcome you.
tradeRequest: My friend, are you interested in this arrangement?
uniques: Gain a free [Local Merchant Gang] [in all cities]
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [10] turns.
